fixed_skill.desc: Cure Dizzy, Sleep, or Forget on 1 ally.

innate_skill.desc: Restore 1 ally's HP by 33.1/34.8/36.4% of Attack + 1001/1239/1495.

passive_skill.desc: Increase max HP by 3.5%. After removing a spiritual ailment, restore target's HP by 12.5% of Attack.
